Catholic Church of St. Thomas of Canterbury

Stratford Rd, Wroxton, Banbury, OX15 6QW

As part of recent changes, our monthly masses will now take place on the first Sunday of the month at 8:30am. Our church remains accessible during daylight hours throughout the week, and we invite individuals and groups of all denominations to find a quiet and sacred space for reflection and prayer.
